name: Seedance 2.0
tagline: Advanced AI video creation with precise narrative control
description: Seedance 2.0 by ByteDance is an advanced AI video generation model built for cinematic, multi-shot storytelling. It creates consistent characters, smooth transitions, and dynamic camera movements from simple prompts. Designed for creators, marketers, and filmmakers, it gives you greater control over motion, scene composition, and narrative flow‚Äîmaking AI video feel more like directing a real film.

name: Cline CLI 2.0
tagline: Parallel agents & headless CI/CD in your terminal
description: Trusted by 5M+ developers, the Cline CLI brings autonomous coding directly to your command line. Fully open source, redesigned from the ground up. Features parallel agents, headless mode for CI/CD, and ACP support for any editor (Zed, Neovim).

name: TexTab
tagline: Turn any AI task into a Keyboard Shortcut
description: Create custom AI actions and trigger them instantly with keyboard shortcuts. Translate, summarize, rewrite, and more.

name: Valentine Online
tagline: Personalized Valentine‚Äôs surprise page for your loved one
description: Valentine Online lets you create a beautiful, shareable romantic page with your own message, memories, inside jokes and vibes. No design or coding needed. Just customize, generate, and send a unique surprise to someone you love.

name: Termsy
tagline: Scans terms and conditions for you
description: Termsy automatically scans Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages, highlights critical clauses, and presents them in a clean sidebar. It helps you make an informed choice, before agreeing. It's fast, lightweight & easy to use. Comes in dark and light modes.

name: WikiTrip 2.0
tagline: Location-based audio guide powered by Wikipedia
description: WikiTrip is an app that reads out interesting Wikipedia articles around you. Perfect for roadtrips, daily commutes or city trips. Learn about the world around you!

name: OpenBug
tagline: Ticket in, fix out. Every solution trains the next one.
description: OpenBug is an open-source CLI that turns bug tickets into fixes. Paste a ticket, and the AI agent investigates your logs, reads your code, correlates across services, and delivers a diff. Every fix adds to a shared runbook in git ‚Äî so your team gets smarter with every bug solved.

name: CozyTwo
tagline: Build a home together, even when you're apart.
description: CozyTwo is your virtual home ‚Äî a private room where LDR couples watch YouTube in perfect sync, send virtual hugs, and just exist together. No more "3, 2, 1, play!" One subscription covers both of you. $29/year or $49 lifetime.

name: Your Love Style
tagline: A choose-your-own-adventure game meets personality quiz
description: Most standard personality tests use a self-reporting mechanism (a questionnaire, a Likert scale) to type someone. But how you answer is completely different than how you act? I wanted to make a quiz that felt more like a scenario game, with context. One that assess how you behave, and then analyzes your results from your actions. Please give it a shot. It's completely free and also doesn't need a log in to see your full results. :)

name: SnapPoint
tagline: Make Your System Snap Back Into Alignment
description: Open-source system auditor and package manager manager. Find ghost binaries, resolve PATH conflicts, and deep-clean your dev machine.

name: Elebean
tagline: Your music companion
description: Elebean is a music-focused app designed to be the central hub for your listening life. Key Features: Music Stats: Track top songs, artists,... with time filters. History: View recent tracks with estimated listening durations. Song Tags: Organize music with custom tags like #work or #chill for easy retrieval. Details: Compatibility: Apple Music supported; Spotify coming soon. Guest Mode: Explore global stats without logging in. Access: Web-based (PWA) for mobile and desktop‚Äîno install required.

name: Breakup Calculator
tagline: AI relationship reality check. Brutally honest odds üíÄ
description: More honest than your therapist. More accurate than your gut feeling. üíÄ Answer quick brutally honest questions and let our AI oracle calculate your exact breakup probability, complete with a savage roast you didn't ask for (but probably needed). Stop pretending. Check your fate. üîÆ

name: Global Psychotherapist Directory
tagline: Health and wellness solution for trauma survivors!
description: Our Global Network is a no-cost directory that connects trauma survivors to therapists offering affordable psychotherapy. We serve clients who can't afford the current market rates, are uninsured or underinsured + have an annual household income below $50,000

name: Emotica - Your Emotions
tagline: Understand ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind your emotions
description: Emotica is a private AI-powered emotion tracking app that helps you discover emotional patterns, understand triggers, and gain clarity in how you feel.

name: EnergyAtIt
tagline: Build on the API layer between AI agents and the power grid
description: Data centers are the largest energy buyers on earth ‚Äî but they can't talk to the grid. The protocols are from the 1990s - we translated all 8 into REST APIs and MCP tools. What you can do today: ‚Üí Ask Claude to "dispatch a battery at 2MW" ‚Äî it does it ‚Üí Generate a cryptographic carbon attestation in one API call ‚Üí Read real-time grid carbon intensity per facility ‚Üí Auto-detect energy subsidies your building qualifies for 200+ REST endpoints. 15 MCP tools. Live sandbox ‚Äî no signup needed.

name: Slopify
tagline: Music for no one, by AI
description: The world's first fully AI-generated music streaming platform. Artists? Fake. Music? Synthetic. Artwork? Hallucinated. Bio's? Imaginary. Codebase? Should be burned at the stake. Algorithmic noise pretending to be culture. And somehow... it slaps. Slopify. Where the future of music goes to become soup.

name: AppifyWeb24
tagline: Convert your website into mobile app - fast and affordable
description: Convert any website to a mobile app in minutes. No coding required. Features include Push Notifications, Biometric Login, and Offline Mode. Try for free!

name: DatingX ‚Äì AI Virtual Practice Date
tagline: Practice your date before it happens
description: DatingX is the first AI Virtual Practice Date designed to reduce pre-date anxiety. Upload your match‚Äôs profile, generate an AI persona, and rehearse your date in a live voice simulation. Practice timing, navigate awkward moments, and build real confidence before the real thing. You wouldn‚Äôt walk into a job interview without practicing. Why do it with dating?

name: MerchBanao
tagline: AI studio to create print-ready merch in seconds
description: Most AI tools generate cool images, but they are not actually usable for selling. You still have to open Photoshop, fix composition, add text, and prepare print files. MerchBanao is built as a merch workflow, not just a generator. You can create a design, edit layout and text, and export 300 DPI print ready files in the same place. It is designed specifically for POD sellers and creators, so you can go from idea to upload in minutes.

name: CanopyAI
tagline: Branch, fork, and explore ideas on an infinite AI canvas
description: An infinite canvas for AI conversations, allowing you to branch and explore multiple paths, without losing the main context
